attributes.action: URGE PEOPLE TO ENSURE THEY CAN AFFORD TO BRING A CHILD INTO THIS WORLD, WITHOUT THE NEED FOR BENEFITS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE CURRENT BENEFITS SYSTEM MAKES HAVING CHILDREN, FOR THOSE WHO COULD NOT AFFORD TO RAISE THEM, A SHREWD CAREER MOVE. A YOUNG WOMAN LIVING AT HOME WITH PARENTS IN AN AVERAGE INNER CITY ENVIRONMENT IS AT THE MOMENT ENCOURAGED BY THE BENEFITS SYSTEM TO HAVE CHILDREN. BY HAVING A CHILD AS A COUPLE OR SINGLE PARENT, IT ENSURES THAT FINANCES ARE RECIEVED EVERY MONTH FROM THE TAXPAYERS AND THAT THE PARENT/ PARENTS BECOME A PRIORITY FOR A COUNCIL HOUSE, WITH SUBSIDISED COUNCIL TAX AND BILLS. THOSE PARENTS WHO ARE FINANCIALLY NOT IN A POSITIION TO HAVE CHILDREN ARE THEREFORE ENCOURAGED TO DO SO BY RECIEVING FREE INCENTIVES. THIS IS NOT AN ACCEPTABLE SITUATION.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
